function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of infectious diseases in indoor spaces","Impact":"Health risks for occupants, potential for widespread outbreak","Mitigation":"Implementation of strategies to prevent, monitor, and respond to infectious diseases","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, contactless technology, monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, facility managers, building owners","Owner":"Facility management teams, building owners"},{"Description":"Non-decreasing natural capital due to critical thresholds","Impact":"Irreversible destruction of natural capital, loss of ecosystem services","Mitigation":"Strict limitation on substitutability between natural capital and other forms of capital, preservation of critical thresholds","Technologies":"Ecosystem monitoring and management, conservation strategies, sustainable land use planning","People":"Environmental conservation organizations, policymakers, land managers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, government bodies"},{"Description":"Sustainability Rating Systems promoting weak sustainability approach","Impact":"Risk of reducing natural capitals, potential long-term environmental damage","Mitigation":"Implementation of strong sustainability principles, adoption of critical threshold approach, emphasis on non-decreasing natural capital","Technologies":"Sustainability assessment tools, environmental impact analysis software, natural capital accounting systems","People":"Sustainability experts, policy-makers, environmental advocates","Owner":"Government agencies, sustainability certification organizations"}]}
